name: Clean the Sea!
description:
Embark on a voyage of environmental salvation and collection with Clean the Sea!—a compelling experience now on Steam.

In a world where the oceans are burdened by humanity's neglect, Clean the Sea! challenges you to pilot a lone vessel on a noble quest: cleanse the waters, rescue marine life, and turn the tide on pollution. As you navigate through tranquil yet troubled waters, your mission is not just to collect refuse but to catalyze change—one scoop of trash at a time.

Your quest will take you across the globe to some of the most iconic and afflicted waterways on the planet. Each location offers unique challenges and opportunities, from the icy embrace of the Antarctic to the historic waterways of Amsterdam. As you progress, you'll witness the tangible impact of your efforts, bringing life and color back to places once choked by waste.




Dive into "Clean the Sea!" where your main quest is to pick up trash. Every piece you collect—bottles, bags, you name it—helps clean up the ocean. Sell the trash, get cash, and watch as the sea transforms back to its natural beauty.



Start with a small skiff and aim high. Upgrades make a big difference: a faster ship speeds up your clean-up missions, and a larger picker increases how much trash you can collect. Upgrade from a skiff to a cruiser, making your clean-up efforts more effective and far-reaching.



Boost your clean-up game by hiring a fleet of mini-ships. These vessels autonomously collect trash, multiplying your impact without extra effort from you. This fleet represents your commitment to efficiency, helping you tackle more of the ocean's pollution with every trip.



As the trash clears, marine life returns to the once-polluted waters. Witness the transformation as dolphins, turtles, and fish reappear, breathing life back into their habitats. This revival of ocean life is a beautiful testament to your hard work and dedication to the cause.
